cast.name: 马修•赫里克 Matthew Stephen Herrick

introduction: One couple's new intense connection is questioned in the midst of the disintegration of another couple; who leads when four men come together?Within a few hours, one couple ends and another begins. Adam is leaving Trent, ending their dysfunctional relationship. Jordan, a mover and recent San Francisco transplant, crosses paths with their roommate Spencer. Their intense connection is questioned as they watch the disintegration of Adam and Trent. Who leads when four men come together?
